denied-reason-1: The participant has decided not to participate after all
denied-reason-2: The participant does not meet the criteria/incorrect information
denied-reason-3: The participant could not be contacted
mail_customer_register-greeting:
Hello study provider,

Thank you for your registration. Click on the following link to confirm your e-mail address:
mail_customer_register-subject: Confirmation of the email address for Probando
mail_customer_register-text-1:
If you did not sign up for Probando, you can ignore this confirmation e-mail. Do you need help? Please contact our support.

Your Probando Team
mail_customer_user_signin-text-2:
Change the status for this study participant in your dashboard to be able to carry out further actions.



To the dashboard
mail_customer_user_unsubsribe-text1: has decided to deregister from your study:
mail_customer_user_unsubsribe-text2: To the dashboard
mail_user_proband_conformation-text1:
,


Congratulations! You were successfully admitted to the study:
mail_user_proband_conformation-text2:
The contact details for your study provider are available in your profile. The study appointments will be announced separately.


To the dashboard
mail_user_proband_inprogress-text2:
has changed to "in progress"


To the dashboard
mail_user_proband_rejection-text1:
,


We are sorry to say you were rejected for participation by the person responsible for the study:
mail_user_proband_rejection-text3:
We hope to see you taking part in another study in the future!


Search a study
mail_user_register-greeting:
Hello study participant,

Thank you for your registration. Click on the following link to confirm your e-mail address:
mail_user_register-subject: Confirmation of the email address for Probando
mail_user_register-text-1:
If you did not sign up for Probando, you can ignore this confirmation e-mail. Do you need help? Please contact our support.

Your Probando Team
mail_user_reset_pw-text-1:
Hello,

please click on the following link to reset your password:
mail_user_reset_pw-text-2:
If you did not asked for the password recovery, you can ignore this e-mail. Do you need help? Please contact our support.

Your Probando Team
mail_user_study_signin-text1:
,


thank you for registering for the study:
mail_user_study_signin-text2:
You will be contacted shortly by the study provider and will then receive a confirmation that you have been admitted to the study.


We are very happy to have you as a part of Probando!


To the dashboard
mail_user_study_signin_from_waitinglist-:
has changed - from waiting list to participant list. The responsible for the study will get in touch with you.





To the dashboard
mail_user_study_signin_waitinglist-text1:
,


Thank you for registering for the study:
mail_user_study_signin_waitinglist-text2:
You are on our waiting list. That means, other applicants have to be denied or have to decline their participation in order for you to participate in the study.




To the dashboard
mail_user_studydate_changed-text3: To the dashboard
mail_user_user_unsubsribe-text1:
,


you have been de-registered from the study:
mail_user_user_unsubsribe-text2:
We are very sorry about this and hope to see you taking part in another study very soon!


Search a study

mail_user_verify_email-text-1:
Hello,

click on the following link to confirm your e-mail address:
mail_user_verify_email-text-2:
If you did not asked for a e-mail verification, you can ignore this confirmation e-mail. Do you need help? Please contact our support.

Your Probando Team
